message:
No; blocking on asynchronous code can cause deadlocks: [https://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/07/dont-block-on-async-code.html](https://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/07/dont-block-on-async-code.html)

Also, even if you avoid the deadlocks, this approach would block a thread. This causes a bad user experience (for UI threads) or worse scalability (for ASP.NET request threads).
